co_catalyst: The co-catalyst used in the experiment is Ag (silver).
light source: 400 W high-pressure Hg lamp with a Pyrex jacket to cut off light at 300 nm
lamp: The lamp used in the experiment is a 400 W high-pressure Hg lamp with a Pyrex jacket to cut off light at 300 nm.
reaction medium: The reaction medium used in the experiment is a 0.1 M aqueous solution of NaHCO3 (sodium bicarbonate) with a volume of 1.0 L.
